info.title: Veterans Affairs Forms
info.description: Access the VA Forms API to search, retrieve PDF links, and metadata for VA forms, including version tracking. Stay updated with the latest VA form information, search by form number or keyword, get detailed metadata, and more. Authenticate using an API token. Test in the sandbox environment before requesting a production API key. Track SHA256 revision history to ensure data integrity and validate PDF links. Identify deleted forms through metadata.

get.description: Retrieve all available VA forms. Optionally filter by form number or title.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Retrieve form data based on entered form name.

get.description: Retrieve a single form and its full revision history

parameters.name: form_name
parameters.description: The VA form name of the form being requested. Include prefixes and hyphens where necessary.

FormsIndex.description: A listing of available VA forms and their location.

title.title: Title
title.description: Title of the form as given by VA
title.example: Instructions and Enrollment Application for Health Benefits

first_issued_on.title: First Issued On
first_issued_on.description: The date the form first became available

last_revision_on.title: Last Revision On
last_revision_on.description: The date the form was last updated

pages.title: Pages
pages.description: Number of pages contained in the form

sha256.title: Sha256
sha256.description: A sha256 hash of the form contents

last_sha256_change.title: Last Sha256 Change
last_sha256_change.description: The date of the last sha256 hash change

valid_pdf.title: Valid Pdf
valid_pdf.description: A flag indicating whether the form URL was confirmed as a valid download

form_usage.title: Form Usage
form_usage.description: A description of how the form is to be used
form_usage.example: Use VA Form 10-10EZ if you’re a Veteran and want to apply for VA health care. You must be enrolled in...

form_tool_intro.title: Form Tool Intro
form_tool_intro.description: Introductory text describing the VA online tool for this form
form_tool_intro.example: You can apply online instead of filling out and sending us the paper form.

form_tool_url.title: Form Tool Url
form_tool_url.description: Location of the online tool for this form

form_details_url.title: Form Details Url
form_details_url.description: Location on www.va.gov of the info page for this form

deleted_at.title: Deleted At
deleted_at.description: The timestamp at which the form was deleted

related_forms.title: Related Forms
related_forms.description: A listing of other forms that relate to the current form

benefit_categories.title: Benefit Categories
benefit_categories.description: Listing of benefit categories and match

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the benefit category of the form

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of the benefit category of the form

va_form_administration.title: VA Form Administration
va_form_administration.description: The VA organization that administers the form

FormShow.description: Data for a particular VA form, including form version history.
